name: nhl_schedules
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nhl_api.
Tool description: This API provides instant access to the latest data for all operations and players in the NHL. It features scores, odds, bookmakers' stats, standings, and historical data.
API description: This endpoint will get NHL schedule data for a specified date when available.

day.description: The day of the desired schedule in 'DD' format.

month.description: The month of the desired schedule in 'MM' format.

year.description: The year of the desired schedule in 'YYYY' format.
